00026 // See GetProcessWorkingSetSize and SetProcessWorkingSetSize
00027 
00028 #define CHECK_MLOCK(ptr, size) (VirtualLock((ptr), (size)) != 0)
00029 #define CHECK_MUNLOCK(ptr, size) (VirtualUnlock((ptr), (size)) != 0)
00030 #define CHECK_MLOCKALL()(false)
00031 #define CHECK_MUNLOCKALL()(false)
00032 
00033 #endif
